name: Split World (tinu.io, Pascal Aregger)
description:
Split World is a really small tower defense kind of game where you have to play together to defend both of your castles.

This game was made during the Epic MegaJam 2022  together with Pascal Aregger given the topic "as above so below". We worked just in the evenings on the game to achieve a little prototype.

The game is meant to be played together which means you have to be two players with their own PCs. In order to play together one has to host the game while the other joins the hosted game.

To be able to find each others hosted games both of you need Steam running in the background.

Controls

W A S D - Move
Space - Shoot
